何段階 飛ばして\r\n: No matter how many levels you skip
映しても 無駄\r\n: There's no point in projecting it
目の前を過ぎれば 同じこと\r\n: They all look the same once they pass in front of your eyes
昨日今日 閃光 / できる？\r\n: Yesterday's and today's flash / Can I?
器用でも貧乏 / できない？\r\n: Dexterous but poor / Can I not?
退屈な心臓 / 今回はどうかな？\r\n: A bored heart / How about this time?
新鮮な動揺 / でもね \r\n: A fresh jolt / But you know
欲しいのは喫驚 / なぜか\r\n: What I want is a surprise / For some reason
壊してく均衡 / やりたい \r\n: To break the balance / I want to do it
’Cause I found that it’s not so boring\r: ’Cause I found that it’s not so boring
ねえ 見てみたい\r\n: Hey, I want to see it
色付く世界へ 行こう\r\n: Let's go to a world filled with color
今度こそ 今度こそ\r\n: This time, this time I want
分かち合う 目と目合わせて\r\n: I want to share it, eye to eye
かつてない疾走 / やりたい\r\n: An unprecedented sprint / I want to do it
ねえ 見てほしい\r\n: Hey, I want you to see it
感じてほしい\r\n: I want you to feel it
